welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huajing, China! Get ready to be enchanted by our city's unique blend of ancient traditions and modern innovations. We invite you to explore our rich cultural heritage and indulge in the delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Shanghai Pudong International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest terminal of Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a Chinese phone number may be required for access.
